name: Supreme Bomb Tag (2 Player)
description: Made in 2 weeks as my preparation for the upcoming Brackeys Game Jam, not 1 week because... I make the rules... A 2-player tag game but with bombs and different abilities like dashing, stopping time, phasing through, portals, and switching positions. Use these abilities to win and the player that has the bomb after the timer runs out loses and will go BOOOOOMM!!
